subject: RE: [junit][:-)] Tick tick tick
msgSnippet: ... We should have an open source site host soon. ... I think it s a good idea in general, it could be reinforced by slowly turning the green bar red. Erik
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: dcorbin@...
> [mailto:dcorbin@...]On Behalf Of David Corbin
> Sent: Saturday, November 18, 2000 4:30 PM
> To: junit@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [junit][:-)] Tick tick tick
>
>
> >
> > What a great idea!
> >
>
> I have them now and then :) When will you have it done :)

We should have an open source site host soon.

> I suspect that for people experienced in "the short-cycle" the timing
> thing happens "innately", but for those of us learning, it will probably
> be a great training tool...

I think it's a good idea in general, it could be reinforced by slowly
turning the green bar red.

Erik
